knimeNode.name: OMERO Reader
knimeNode.shortDescription: Experimental node that reads images from an OMERO database.

fullDescription.intro: This (experimental) reader uses OMEREO.insight to access images from OMERO databases. In the configuration phase the insight viewer is used as graphical interface to select image IDs from the database. During the node execution the images are loaded from the database and get converted into an appropriate ImgLib format.

tab.name: user credentials
tab.option: The address of the OMERO server.
A port that can be used to connect with OMERO.insight to the server (standard value 4064).
The speed of your server connection LAN, High (Broadband) or Low (Dial-up)
The username, that you use to access the server with OMERO.insight
The password, that you use to access the server with OMERO.insight

ul.li: Fill in the user credentials form.
Start OMERO.insight by clicking onto the start button.
Browse the database and select images with your mouse.
Right click on one/multiple selected images to access the context menu.
Select "View->View in KNIME" to transmit the image ID
Repeat this for all images that should be loaded to your workflow
Close OMERO.insight. The image IDs are listed in the IDs field and the node is ready for execution.

ports.outPort: The images that have been loaded from the OMERO database

views.view: Shows the loaded images in a table cell view
